mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.old_member_id AS "oldMemberId", a.new_member_id AS "newMemberId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.total AS "total", a.sort AS "sort", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_member_commission( id, old_member_id, new_member_id, order_id, total, sort, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{oldMemberId}, #{newMemberId}, #{orderId}, #{total}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
